Structs/MIME.html#/s:4MIMEAAV3extSSSgvp.name: ext
Structs/MIME.html#/s:4MIMEAAV3extSSSgvp.abstract: A file extension matching a type/subtype value such as swift, js, etc.

Structs/MIME.html#/s:4MIMEAAV4type7subty.name: init(type:subtype:ext:)
Structs/MIME.html#/s:4MIMEAAV4type7subty.abstract: Initializes a new instance with a type, subtype, and file extension as a hint since MIME types can have multiple file extensions. For

Structs/MIME.html#/s:4MIMEAAV_3extABSS_S.name: init(_:ext:)
Structs/MIME.html#/s:4MIMEAAV_3extABSS_S.abstract: Initializes a new instance with the combination of type/subtype and a file extension as a hint since MIME types can have multiple file extensions.

Structs/MIME.html#/s:4MIMEAAV3extABSS_tc.name: init(ext:)
Structs/MIME.html#/s:4MIMEAAV3extABSS_tc.abstract: Initializes a new instance with a file extension. It falls back to application/octet-stream if the file extension is invalid.

Structs/MIME.html#/s:4MIMEAAV4pathABSS_t.name: init(path:)
Structs/MIME.html#/s:4MIMEAAV4pathABSS_t.abstract: Initializes a new instance with a file path. It falls back to application/octet-stream if the file path is invalid.

Structs/MIME.html#/s:4MIMEAAV3urlAB10Fou.name: init(url:)
Structs/MIME.html#/s:4MIMEAAV3urlAB10Fou.abstract: Initializes a new instance with a file URL. It falls back to application/octet-stream if the file URL is invalid.

Structs/MIME.html.name: MIME
Structs/MIME.html.abstract: A media type (also known as a Multipurpose Internet Mail Extensions or MIME type) is a standard that indicates the nature and format of a document, file,
